site_name: Site Of Former Northolt Grange Community Centre And Part Of St Raphael's Catholic School
description: Details of Energy Strategy part pursuant to condition 26 (part c only) of planning permission ref: 220545FULR3 dated 23.05.2023 for: Development of 92 residential dwellings (Use Class C3) with associated vehicular and pedestrian access across three buildings ranging from two to five storeys in height, children play space, residential amenity space, public realm and landscaping works, a new public open space, vehicle and cycle parking and other associated works. (Following demolition of the existing community centre, school building, playground, MUGA and associated structures) [Regulation 3 Application by London Borough of Ealing]
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
